Description: Fragment of neck and sub-round handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '450'. Name Aristopolis. Perhaps from the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0088.25.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (82)
